attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877252681. This is a great Crossover vehicle that is still in very good condition and has room to put a lot more kms on the clock.
It has a turbo engine that performs well, is nippy in traffic and goes well on the highway. It handles well, is as easy to park as a hatch back and has a comfortable driving position. It is a reliable vehicle that is light on fuel.
Test drives are available, trade ins are welcome and finance can be arranged.
Please note that the advertised price does not include admin fees of R8500 which will be charged on all vehicles sold.
